====================================
Variable declaration
====================================

var x = 5;

---

(source_file
  (variable_declaration
    name: (identifier)
    value: (number_literal)))

====================================
Function declaration
====================================

function greet(name) {
    return "Hello " + name;
}

---

(source_file
  (function_declaration
    name: (identifier)
    parameters: (parameter_list (identifier))
    body: (block_statement
      (return_statement
        (additive_expression
          (string_literal)
          (identifier))))))

====================================
If statement
====================================

if (x > 0) {
    notify("Positive");
} else {
    notify("Not positive");
}

---

(source_file
  (if_statement
    condition: (relational_expression
      (identifier)
      (number_literal))
    then: (block_statement
      (expression_statement
        (call_expression
          function: (identifier)
          arguments: (argument_list (string_literal)))))
    else: (block_statement
      (expression_statement
        (call_expression
          function: (identifier)
          arguments: (argument_list (string_literal)))))))

====================================
Editor API calls
====================================

var line = getCurrentLine();
setLineText(line, "New content");

---

(source_file
  (variable_declaration
    name: (identifier)
    value: (call_expression
      function: (identifier)
      arguments: (argument_list)))
  (expression_statement
    (call_expression
      function: (identifier)
      arguments: (argument_list
        (identifier)
        (string_literal)))))

====================================
Object literal
====================================

var config = {
    theme: "dark",
    fontSize: 14,
    enabled: true
};

---

(source_file
  (variable_declaration
    name: (identifier)
    value: (object_literal
      (object_member (identifier) (string_literal))
      (object_member (identifier) (number_literal))
      (object_member (identifier) (boolean_literal)))))

====================================
Array literal and loops
====================================

var items = [1, 2, 3];
for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
    log(items[i]);
}

---

(source_file
  (variable_declaration
    name: (identifier)
    value: (array_literal
      (number_literal)
      (number_literal)
      (number_literal)))
  (for_statement
    init: (variable_declaration
      name: (identifier)
      value: (number_literal))
    condition: (relational_expression
      (identifier)
      (member_expression
        object: (identifier)
        property: (identifier)))
    update: (assignment_expression
      left: (identifier)
      operator: (string))
    body: (block_statement
      (expression_statement
        (call_expression
          function: (identifier)
          arguments: (argument_list
            (subscript_expression
              object: (identifier)
              index: (identifier))))))))

====================================
Comments
====================================

// Single line comment
function test() {
    /* Multi-line
       comment */
    var x = 5;
}

---

(source_file
  (comment)
  (function_declaration
    name: (identifier)
    parameters: (parameter_list)
    body: (block_statement
      (comment)
      (variable_declaration
        name: (identifier)
        value: (number_literal)))))
